AbilityBonusOption.Description: -50 Lightning resistance
Unit loses 1/4th of its Dodge

A dead Ancestor has returned to haunt this Centaur. It wants to know why the old traditions have been abandoned. The Centaur has constant nightmares during sleep, and secondguesses itself constantly.
-50% of current Spell Resist

GameModifier.Provides:
A dead Ancestor has returned to haunt this Centaur. It wants to know why the old traditions have been abandoned. The Centaur has constant nightmares during sleep, and secondguesses itself constantly.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This Elf suffers from a distorted world perception where it sees itself as far more than it really is, and enemies as far less than they really are.
Loses 1/3rd of Accuracy when attacking any lower level enemy

GameModifier.Provides:
This Elf suffers from a distorted world perception where it sees itself as far more than it really is, and enemies as far less than they really are.
Loses 1/3rd of Accuracy when attacking any lower level enemy

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
The power of the forests tried to heal a wound suffered by this Elf. Instead of assisting in the healing process, a wooden growth now exists where one foot should be.
-10 Dodge

GameModifier.Provides:
The power of the forests tried to heal a wound suffered by this Elf. Instead of assisting in the healing process, a wooden growth now exists where one foot should be.
-10 Dodge

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This Elf is slowly fading away due to apathy.
Champion no longer counts as Immortal. No effect (spells or items) can return this elf to Immortality as long as this injury remains.

GameModifier.Provides:
This Elf is slowly fading away due to apathy.
Champion no longer counts as Immortal. No effect (spells or items) can return this elf to Immortality as long as this injury remains.

AbilityBonusOption.Description: -25% Hitpoints

Parts of this Living Stone have become crystallized in a solid form. It is extremely painful to move for this poor champion.
-5 Initiative

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
A vital part of any Living Stone is the "will of fire" held in one's heart. It is gone from this one, however.
Champion's passive Fire attack is reduced by 50%

A vital part of any Living Stone is the "will of fire" held in one's heart. It is gone from this one, however.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
This Shadow has lost most of its control over its own change between solid and ethereal state. How embarassing!
Champion suffers -15 Resistance to physical attacks, and also suffers -10 Dodge

GameModifier.Provides:
This Shadow has lost most of its control over its own change between solid and ethereal state. How embarassing!
-15 physical resistance

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
Some Shadows develop their own shadows when they grow very old. It is seen as a bad omen by some, and a fatal weakness in character by others.
-1 Faction Prestige

GameModifier.Provides:
Some Shadows develop their own shadows when they grow very old. It is seen as a bad omen by some, and a fatal weakness in character by others.

AbilityBonusOption.Description:
During a Shadow's formation it undergoes a state of weakness before attaining power over its abilities and becoming sentient. This Shadow has returned to that "Dependent State".
Champion has its magical resistances (Fire, Cold, Lightning, Poison) reduced by -25

GameModifier.Provides:
+1 Injury
